Package org.apache.drill.exec.store.kafka

package org.apache.drill.exec.store.kafka
Kafka storage plugin. Enables querying Kafka as a data store, supported for Avro and Json message types.

    Description
    KafkaAsyncCloser
    Closes Kafka resources asynchronously which result does not depend on close method in order to improve query execution performance.
